name: Unanswered- Sprint #2 [Playtest]
description:
YOU SHOULD PLAY IN FULLSCREEN IF IT WORKS!

This is the second iteration of my 2D atmospheric puzzle platformer/adventure game- largely inspired by great games like LIMBO and INSIDE. 

I have made drastic improvements to the atmosphere, visuals, audio, movement mechanics and level design since last sprint, and am excited for you to try it!

There are now four stages to play through- roughly triple the length of the first sprint, and much more is to come in the future!

Note: any exit/quit to desktop options will just crash the game, and you'll have to reload the page to try again!

Would really appreciate feedback once you've given it a  go! https://forms.gle/uxyLxkHe7o3w6txg7

Hope you enjoy :D

by Ethan Davidson
